data.name: SEEDS
data.description:
What is SEEDS - Quick intro:

https://youtu.be/WXWBSffxT88

The Evolution of Money: Gold, Dollars, Bitcoin & Seeds

https://youtu.be/qF5aEd0d1SI

SEEDS Is a Regenerative Economy:

SEEDS builds on top of the last decade of financial innovation. Taking the tools of the DeFi revolution and rewiring them to create a new type of Economic System. An economy that's regenerative by design so that we can use the immense power of this crypto revolution to fuel a Renaissance. We call this ReFi (Regenerative Finance) and REcon (Regenerative Economics) where we're not just recreating financial infrastructure, but fundamentally redesigning how an economy could serve the people and our planet.

A Guide to SEEDS and DeFi:
https://medium.com/joinseeds/your-seeds-decentralised-exchange-and-defi-guide-d2a7e861a117

A quick intro to Regenerative Economics: 

https://medium.com/joinseeds/a-regenerative-financial-system-for-a-thriving-global-civilization-eebecead5b43

and,

https://medium.com/joinseeds/decentralizing-our-economies-with-gratitude-8526fb8c6bf8

Who's behind SEEDS?

Hundreds of organizations have signed the pledge to ally with SEEDS and grow the Regenerative Renaissance. As of June 2021 over 150 campaign and alliance proposals have been funded by the Citizens of SEEDS using decentralized governance to finance partnerships and growth of the SEEDS ecosystem. 

Hypha (dho.hypha.earth) is a DAO, but they call it a DHO (Decentralised Human Organisation) that's being contracted by SEEDS to build technology, such as the SEEDS Global Passport, SEEDS Smart Contracts, SEEDS Swap, SEEDS Light Wallet, Economic Modeling tools, Website and more. All of this is fully transparent, open and decentralized.

Who's funding SEEDS?

The people! From July of 2017 when SEEDS started until now (June 2021) there's been $0 in venture capital into SEEDS. This means that SEEDS is fully grassroots funded! 

SEEDS TL;DR

Crafted from systems that reflect the latest in financial, social and political innovation, SEEDS is the web that connects and nurtures a globally regenerative culture. Creating a new type of economic system that's regenerative by design. 

https://joinseeds.earth/pdf/3-Pager-V5-0.pdf
